short_summary: purchase and delivery of two (2) 8 passenger golf carts for RCMP.
description: For (2) 8 passenger golf carts for transporting personnel within RCMP Depot Training Grounds. Estimated quantity: 2. Estimated duration: March 31, 2023. Best delivery date: to be completed by the Bidder. Method of selection: lowest compliant bidder. Full description and terms in attached documents.
full_summary:
### Solicitation Notice for Ground Effect Vehicles

The Government of Canada, through Contracting Entity Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), invites bids for the supply and delivery of two eight (8) passenger golf carts.

**Contract Details:**
* **Contract Title (English/French):** Eight (8) Passenger Golf Cart / Voiturette de golf à huit (8) passagers
* **Contract Reference Number (English/French):** PW-23-01021174 / PW-23-01021174
* **Solicitation Reference Number (English/French):** M5000-23-4328/A / M5000-23-4328/A
* **Publication Date:** 12 January 2023 / 12 janvier 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 30 January 2023 (15:00:00)
* **Latitude for Late Submissions:** Not Applicable
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** To be determined
* **Expected Contract End Date:** To be determined

**Key Contract Specifications:**
* **Quantity:** 2 units
* **Duration of Contract:** To be determined
* **Delivery Timeframe:** March 28, 2023 (latest date of delivery)

**Selection Criteria:**
* **Evaluation Method:** Lowest Compliant Bid
* **Evaluation Matrix:** Technical Evaluation

**Tender Requirements:**
* **Submission Language:** Either official language of Canada (English/French)
* **Submission Protocol:** Electronic submission via email [Northwest Region Delivery mailbox - NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
* **Required Documents:** Refer to the attached tender documents

**Important Reminders:**
* **Notice of Proposed Procurement:** Published on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website at canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities
* **Right to Negotiate:** Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier

**Contact Information:**
* **Procurement Contact:** Lianne Hopkie
* **Email Address:** lianne.hopkie@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* **Phone Number:** 639-625-3630
